metadata.documentation: This is a template policy file. Copy it to create your own organisation-specific policy.
customisation_notes: 1. Change the policyName to your organisation name (e.g., 'acme-corp-security')
2. Update the description and author fields
3. Modify rule patterns to match your organisation's specific data formats
4. Add new rules as needed for your security requirements
5. Adjust severity levels and risk thresholds to match your risk tolerance
6. Test your custom policy thoroughly before deploying to production
